html: The #BeHEARD Act *finally* writes the dignity of workers into the law and sends a simple, clear message: No matter your race, income, or job, you have a right to be safe at your job. #Timesup- And time for change.
text:
The #BeHEARD Act *finally* writes the dignity of workers into the law and sends a simple, clear message: No matter your race, income, or job, you have a right to be safe at your job. 

#Timesup- And time for change.

html: The #BeHEARD will ● prohibit mandatory arbitration & pre-dispute nondisclosure agreements ● extend the statute of limitations for claims ● eliminate the diff in the minimum wage btw tipped & hourly workers ● require workplaces to create harassment prevention strategies
text:
The #BeHEARD will
● prohibit mandatory arbitration & pre-dispute nondisclosure agreements
● extend the statute of limitations for claims
● eliminate the diff in the minimum wage btw tipped & hourly workers
● require workplaces to create harassment prevention strategies

html: Last March, I stood in solidarity with Rosa, a subcontract worker at Logan Airport. Rosa experienced unspeakable assault. Her supervisor exposed himself to her, routinely touched her, and fired her in retaliation for reporting his behavior. No more.
text:
Last March, I stood in solidarity with Rosa, a subcontract worker at Logan Airport. Rosa experienced unspeakable assault. Her supervisor exposed himself to her, routinely touched her, and fired her in retaliation for reporting his behavior. 

No more.

html: Our budget reflects our values. Here's just a taste of the cuts in the #TrumpBudget: $220 bil from SNAP (food support for our neediest families) $1.5 trillion from Medicaid $207 bil from student loan programs $5.4 bil from the @NIH This isn't a budget #ForThePeople.
text:
Our budget reflects our values. Here's just a taste of the cuts in the #TrumpBudget:
$220 bil from SNAP (food support for our neediest families)
$1.5 trillion from Medicaid
$207 bil from student loan programs
 $5.4 bil from the @NIH

This isn't a budget #ForThePeople.

html: My tax credit would: Reduce the cost of childcare for families earning up to 400% of the federal poverty level. Ensure the quality of childcare through ed standards. Support increased employee pay to recruit and retain a qualified, diverse workforce.
text:
My tax credit would: 

Reduce the cost of childcare for families earning up to 400% of the federal poverty level.
Ensure the quality of childcare through ed standards.
Support increased employee pay to recruit and retain a qualified, diverse workforce.
